solution_line_template: In a week, he orders {num_boxes} * {apples_per_box} = <<{num_boxes}*{apples_per_box}={apples_ordered_weekly}>>{apples_ordered_weekly} apples.

When {fraction_sold} of the stock is sold, the total amount of apples sold becomes {fraction_sold} * {apples_ordered_weekly} = <<{fraction_sold}*{apples_ordered_weekly}={apples_sold}>>{apples_sold} apples.
The amount of apples remaining is {apples_ordered_weekly} - {apples_sold} = <<{apples_ordered_weekly}-{apples_sold}={apples_not_sold}>>{apples_not_sold} apples.
